subject: Reset your Seatsurfing password
headline: Hello {{recipientName}},
paragraphs: we've received a request to reset your password.

buttons.paragraph: If this request was yours, you can change your password here:
buttons.label: Change password

finalParagraphs: If you did not initiate a password reset for your Seatsurfing account, you can safely ignore this email. We won't change your password if you don't click the link above.
